com.github.moribund.entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.entity.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayableCharacter

    public final class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayableCharacter
    The Player that represents somebody being controlled by the client of its respective Connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int playerId, float startingX, float startingY)
      Makes a Player with its unique player ID and provides the spawn tile the Player starts at.
